# init(items:mode:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a push behavior with an array of dynamic items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(items: [any UIDynamicItem], mode: UIPushBehavior.Mode)
```

## Parameters

- **items**: The dynamic items that you want to be subject to the push behavior.
- **mode**: The mode for the new push behavior; one of the values defined in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPushBehavior/Mode-swift.enum] enumeration. You must supply a value.

## Return Value

The initialized push behavior, or `nil` if there was a problem initializing the object.

## Initializing and managing a push behavior

- **active**: The state of the push behavior’s force: either active or inactive.
- **addItem(_:)**: Adds a dynamic item to the behavior’s dynamic item array.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes a specific dynamic item from the behavior.
- **items**: Returns the set of dynamic items you’ve added to the push behavior.
